article:
_ upon a time, a man told people of the coming of a boy. He said the boy would save his people.
There was a man called Joseph and his _ was Mary. It is said that one night an angel came to Mary and told her she was to have this special boy. The angel also came to Joseph and told him _ same thing.
At that time, everyone had to go back to their own hometown to be counted. Mary and Joseph had to travel before the baby was born . It was a long journey. They didn't arrive _ very late one night. They looked _ a place to stay, but all the places were full. They didn't know where to go. _ last the owner of a house said they could stay in the barn. That night gave birth _ this very special boy.
Soon, angels came up and told shepherds that the special baby had been born. Joseph called the baby Jesus.
People called him Jesus because Christmas means saving . Years later, people still celebrate Jesus' birthday. They call it Christmas, which comes from the name Christ.
